channel.title: Server goes from FAST to slowwwwww
channel.description: Welll if i starter my server with new source its goes fast but if i run it long it beguns go slow, and you need click much: Log In, IDK just what it is. I think its Syipker or somithing, i founded nulls im ma player list and than i got that. i need answer. Im sorry i doing this but if you want see whats wrong : Gamepure.no-ip.biz And i hate my players spamming for my server.
